import React, { Component } from 'react' import 'slick-carousel/slick/slick.css' import 'slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css' import Slider from 'react-slick' import './offerSlider.css' export class OfferSlider extends Component { render() { var settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, speed: 500, centerMode: true, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, } return (
Slick Carousel In React Application
) } } export default OfferSlider
